shortdesc.ph: Gets the playback progress of the specified sound effect file.
Gets the playback progress of the specified sound effect file.
Gets the playback progress of the specified sound effect file.
Gets the playback progress of the specified sound effect file.

section.note: You need to call this method after .

plentry.pd: The ID of the sound effect. Each sound effect has a unique ID.
ID of the sound effect. Each sound effect has a unique ID.

ul.li: If the method call succeeds, returns the playback progress of the specified sound effect file (in milliseconds).
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

< 0: The method call fails. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
